00039 ConfigMenu::ConfigMenu(void)
00040   : Menu("cli-config", Help()
00041         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "CLI settings menu")
00042         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Menu de configuration du CLI")),
00043     m_pcliEcho(NULL), m_pcliEchoOn(NULL), m_pcliEchoOff(NULL),
00044     m_pcliBeep(NULL), m_pcliBeepOn(NULL), m_pcliBeepOff(NULL),
00045     m_pcliLang(NULL), m_pcliEnglishLang(NULL), m_pcliFrenchLang(NULL)
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 ConfigMenu::~ConfigMenu(void)
00050 {
00051 }

00053 void ConfigMenu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00054 {
00055     Menu::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00056     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00057             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify echo behavior")
00058             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Configuration de l'écho"));
00059         m_pcliEcho = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("echo", cli_Help)));
00060         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00061                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo on")
00062                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Activation de l'écho"));
00063             m_pcliEchoOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00064             m_pcliEchoOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00065         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00066                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set echo off")
00067                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Désactivation de l'écho"));
00068             m_pcliEchoOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliEcho->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00069             m_pcliEchoOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00070     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00071             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Modify beep behavior")
00072             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Configuration du bip"));
00073         m_pcliBeep = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("beep", cli_Help)));
00074         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00075                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep on")
00076                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Activation du bip"));
00077             m_pcliBeepOn = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("on", cli_Help)));
00078             m_pcliBeepOn->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00079         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00080                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Set beep off")
00081                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Désactivation du bip"));
00082             m_pcliBeepOff = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliBeep->AddElement(new Keyword("off", cli_Help)));
00083             m_pcliBeepOff->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00084     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00085             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Language setting")
00086             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Modification de la langue"));
00087         m_pcliLang = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("lang", cli_Help)));
00088         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00089                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "English language")
00090                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Langue anglaise"));
00091             m_pcliEnglishLang = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliLang->AddElement(new Keyword("english", cli_Help)));
00092             m_pcliEnglishLang->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00093         {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00094                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "French language")
00095                 .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Langue française"));
00096             m_pcliFrenchLang = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& m_pcliLang->AddElement(new Keyword("french", cli_Help)));
00097             m_pcliFrenchLang->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }}
00098 }

00100 const bool ConfigMenu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00101 {
00102     CommandLineIterator it(CLI_CmdLine);
00103 
00104     if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00105     else if (it == GetEchoNode())
00106     {
00107         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00108         else if (it == GetEchoOnNode())
00109         {
00110             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00111             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00112             {
00113                 EchoOn();
00114                 return true;
00115             }
00116         }
00117         else if (it == GetEchoOffNode())
00118         {
00119             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00120             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00121             {
00122                 EchoOff();
00123                 return true;
00124             }
00125         }
00126     }
00127     else if (it == GetBeepNode())
00128     {
00129         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00130         else if (it == GetBeepOnNode())
00131         {
00132             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00133             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00134             {
00135                 BeepOn();
00136                 return true;
00137             }
00138         }
00139         else if (it == GetBeepOffNode())
00140         {
00141             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00142             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00143             {
00144                 BeepOff();
00145                 return true;
00146             }
00147         }
00148     }
00149     else if (it == GetLangNode())
00150     {
00151         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00152         else if (it == GetEnglishLangNode())
00153         {
00154             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00155             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00156             {
00157                 SetLang(ResourceString::LANG_EN);
00158                 return true;
00159             }
00160         }
00161         else if (it == GetFrenchLangNode())
00162         {
00163             if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00164             if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00165             {
00166                 SetLang(ResourceString::LANG_FR);
00167                 return true;
00168             }
00169         }
00170     }
00171 
00172     return Menu::ExecuteReserved(CLI_CmdLine);
00173 }
00174 
00175 const bool ConfigMenu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CmdLine) const
00176 {
00177     return false;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void ConfigMenu::EchoOn(void) const
00181 {
00182     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, true);
00183     const ResourceString cli_EchoOn = ResourceString()
00184         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "echo is on")
00185         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "écho activé");
00186     GetOutputStream() << cli_EchoOn.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00187 }
00188 
00189 void ConfigMenu::EchoOff(void) const
00190 {
00191     GetShell().EnableStream(ECHO_STREAM, false);
00192     const ResourceString cli_EchoOff = ResourceString()
00193         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "echo is off")
00194         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "écho désactivé");
00195     GetOutputStream() << cli_EchoOff.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00196 }
00197 
00198 void ConfigMenu::BeepOn(void) const
00199 {
00200     GetShell().SetBeep(true);
00201     const ResourceString cli_BeepOn = ResourceString()
00202         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "beep is on")
00203         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "bip activé");
00204     GetOutputStream() << cli_BeepOn.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00205 }
00206 
00207 void ConfigMenu::BeepOff(void) const
00208 {
00209     GetShell().SetBeep(false);
00210     const ResourceString cli_BeepOff = ResourceString()
00211         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "beep is off")
00212         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "bip désactivé");
00213     GetOutputStream() << cli_BeepOff.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00214 }
00215 
00216 void ConfigMenu::SetLang(const ResourceString::LANG E_Lang) const
00217 {
00218     GetShell().SetLang(E_Lang);
00219     const ResourceString cli_SelectedLanguage = ResourceString()
00220         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "English language")
00221         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Langue française");
00222     GetOutputStream() << cli_SelectedLanguage.GetString(GetShell().GetLang()) << endl;
00223 }
